Create a new timer
true if a time has been created, otherwise false
name
of the new timer, 0 if the creation failed

Delete a timer
true if a time has been deleted, otherwise false
name
of the timer to delete

Start the time with name name
name
name of the timer to start

Stop the time with name name. Does not reset.
name
name of the timer to stop

Resets the timer's counter.
name
name of the timer to reset.

Return the average time for timer execution as the total time for the timer dividied by the number of completed (stopped) runs the timer has made. Excludes the current running time if the timer is currently running.
name
name of the timer to return the time of

Total execution time for the timer over all runs since the last reset or timer creation.
name
name of the timer to obtain the value of.
